verses.verse: And Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126> sent<WH7971> out of Acacia<WH7851> two<WH8147> men<WH582> to spy<WH7270> secretly<WH2791>, saying<WH559>, Go<WH3212> view<WH7200> the land<WH776>, even Jericho<WH3405>. And it was told<WH559> the king<WH4428> of Jericho<WH3405>, saying<WH559>, Behold<WH935>, there came men<WH582> in here to night<WH3915> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to search out<WH2658> the country<WH776>.

And the king<WH4428> of Jericho<WH3405> sent<WH7971> to Rahab<WH7343>, saying<WH559>, Bring forth<WH3318> the men<WH582> that have come<WH935> to you<WH935>, which have entered into your house<WH1004>: for they have come<WH935> to search out<WH2658> all the country<WH776>.
And the woman<WH802> took<WH3947> the two<WH8147> men<WH582>, and hid<WH6845> them<WH559>, and said, There came<WH935> men<WH582> to me<WH3045>, but I knew not where they came from<WH370>.

And it came to pass about the time of the shutting<WH5462> of the gate<WH8179>, when it was dark<WH2822>, that the men<WH582> went out<WH3318>: where the men<WH582> went<WH1980> I know<WH3045> not<WH7291>: pursue after<WH310> them quickly<WH4118>; for you shall overtake them<WH5381>.
But she had brought them up<WH5927> to the roof<WH1406> of the house<WH2934>, and hid them with the stalks<WH6086> of flax<WH6593>, which she had laid in order<WH6186> upon the roof<WH1406>.

And the men<WH582> pursued<WH7291> after<WH310> them the way<WH1870> to Jordan<WH3383> to the fords<WH4569>: and as soon as they which pursued<WH7291> after<WH310> them were gone out<WH3318>, they shut<WH5462> the gate<WH8179>.
And before they were laid down<WH7901>, she came up<WH5927> to them on the roof<WH1406>;

And she said<WH559> to the men<WH582>, I know<WH3045> that the Lord<WH3068> has given<WH5414> you the land<WH776>, and that your terror<WH367> is fallen<WH5307> upon us<WH3427>, and that all the inhabitants of the land<WH776> faint<WH4127> because of you<WH6440>.

For we have heard<WH8085> how the Lord<WH3068> dried up<WH3001> the water<WH4325> of the Red<WH5488> Sea<WH3220> for you<WH6440>, when you came out<WH3318> of Egypt<WH4714>; and what you did<WH6213> to the two<WH8147> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, that were on the other side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383>, Sihon<WH5511> and Og<WH5747>, whom you utterly destroyed<WH2763>.

And as soon as we had heard<WH8085> these things<WH3824>, our hearts did melt<WH4549>, neither did there remain<WH6965> any more courage<WH7307> in any man<WH376>, because<WH6440> of you<WH3068>: for the Lord your God<WH430>, he is God<WH430> in heaven<WH8064> above<WH4605>, and in earth beneath<WH776>.

Now therefore<WH7650>, I pray you, swear unto me by the Lord<WH3068>, since<WH3588> I have showed<WH6213> you kindness<WH2617>, that you will also show<WH6213> kindness<WH2617> unto my father<WH1>'s house<WH1004>, and give<WH5414> me a true<WH571> token<WH226>:

And that you will save alive<WH2421> my father<WH1>, and my mother<WH517>, and my brothers<WH251>, and my sisters<WH269>, and all that they have<WH5337>, and deliver our lives<WH5315> from death<WH4194>.

And the men<WH582> answered<WH559> her<WH5315>, Our life for yours<WH4191>, if you utter<WH5046> not this our business<WH1697>. And it shall be<WH3068>, when the Lord has given<WH5414> us the land<WH776>, that we will deal<WH6213> kindly<WH2617> and truly with you<WH571>.
Then she let them down<WH3381> by a cord<WH2256> through<WH1157> the window<WH2474>: for her house<WH1004> was upon the town<WH7023> wall<WH2346>, and she lived<WH3427> upon the wall<WH2346>.

And she said<WH559> unto them<WH3212>, Get to the mountain<WH2022>, lest the pursuers<WH7291> meet<WH6293> you<WH2247>; and hide yourselves there three<WH7969> days<WH3117>, until the pursuers<WH7291> have returned<WH7725>: and afterward<WH310> may you go<WH3212> your way<WH1870>.
And the men<WH582> said<WH559> unto her<WH5355>, We will be blameless of this your oath<WH7621> which you have made us swear<WH7650>.

Unless<WH935>, when we come into the land<WH776>, you shall bind<WH7194> this line<WH8615> of scarlet<WH8144> thread<WH2339> in the window<WH2474> which you did let us down by<WH3381>: and you shall bring<WH622> your father<WH1>, and your mother<WH517>, and your brothers<WH251>, and all your father<WH1>'s household<WH1004>, into your house<WH1004>.

And it shall be<WH834>, that whoever shall go out<WH3318> of the doors<WH1817> of your house<WH1004> into the street<WH2351>, his blood<WH1818> shall be upon his head<WH7218>, and we will be guiltless<WH5355>: and whoever shall be with you in the house<WH1004>, his blood<WH1818> shall be on our head<WH7218>, if any hand is laid on him<WH3027>.
And if you utter<WH5046> this our business<WH1697>, then we will be quit<WH5355> of your oath<WH7621> which you have made us to swear<WH7650>.

And she said<WH559>, According unto your words<WH1697>, so be it<WH7971>. And she sent them away, and they departed<WH3212>: and she bound<WH7194> the scarlet<WH8144> line<WH8615> in the window<WH2474>.

And they went<WH3212>, and came<WH935> unto the mountain<WH2022>, and stayed<WH3427> there three<WH7969> days<WH3117>, until the pursuers<WH7291> were returned<WH7725>: and the pursuers<WH7291> sought<WH1245> them throughout all the way<WH1870>, but found them not<WH4672>.

So the two<WH8147> men<WH582> returned<WH7725>, and descended<WH3381> from the mountain<WH2022>, and passed over<WH5674>, and came<WH935> to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>, and told<WH5608> him all things that happened them<WH4672>:

And they said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, Truly<WH3588> the Lord<WH3068> has delivered<WH5414> into our hands<WH3027> all the land<WH776>; for even all the inhabitants<WH3427> of the country<WH776> do faint<WH4127> because of us<WH6440>.
